name: Return the details of a SEPA Direct Debit

testSteps.description: Given I logged into the API earlier
And I have confirmed a Customer with a cif Key "0100000935430811000"
And I have authenticated the Customer to authentication level 1

When I search for for the details of the following SEPA Direct Debit:
| nsc | account | uniqueMandateReferenceNumber | sepaOIN |
| 932361 | 07555060 | AIBE2E00201 | IE19ZZZ309023 |

children.description: Get sepa direct debit details: 932361, 07555060, AIBE2E00201, IE19ZZZ309023

testSteps.description: Then I should receive back a successful response

And the following SEPA Direct Debit Details should be returned
| nsc | accountNumber | bic | iban | sepaOIN | uniqueMandateReferenceNumber | originatorBIC | originatorIBAN | originatorName | lastSettledAmount | mandateSetUpDate | lastSettledDate | reasonForCancellation | lastUpdatedByStaffNumber | status | mandateType | amountLimit | startDate | endDate | limitRestriction | dateRestriction |
| 932361 | 07555060 | AIBKIE2DXXX | IE68AIBK93236107555060 | IE19ZZZ309023 | AIBE2E00201 | DABAIE20 | IE55DABA95150161088009 | AIBE2EV0.1.1 | 11.00 | 30/04/2013 | 08/05/2013 | Switched | < >51990 | Switched | FRST | 12343 | 30/10/2013 | 30/10/2013 | L | DR |

children.description: Validate sepa direct debit details response: | nsc | accountNumber | bic | iban | sepaOIN | uniqueMandateReferenceNumber | originatorBIC | originatorIBAN | originatorName | lastSettledAmount | mandateSetUpDate | lastSettledDate | reasonForCancellation | lastUpdatedByStaffNumber | status | mandateType | amountLimit | startDate | endDate | limitRestriction | dateRestriction | | 932361 | 07555060 | AIBKIE2DXXX | IE68AIBK93236107555060 | IE19ZZZ309023 | AIBE2E00201 | DABAIE20 | IE55DABA95150161088009 | AIBE2EV0.1.1 | 11.00 | 30/04/2013 | 08/05/2013 | Switched | < >51990 | Switched | FRST | 12343 | 30/10/2013 | 30/10/2013 | L | DR |
